'''3.7.2''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|Launcher]] released on January 13, 2025.

== Changes ==
* Bug fixes for newly added Editor Mode & Marketplace Pass pages.
* Offline Mode bug fixes.
* Updates to crash dump reporting flow.
* Various other bug fixes and under the hood improvements.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-24786}} - Launcher string missing space between "log out" or "log in"
